title: Onomichi U2
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Western, Buffet, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. U2 houses a western style hotel geared towards cyclists with a cafe, restaurant, bar, gift shop and bike shop. Western menu includes vegetarian options but limited for vegans. Bread and vegetable salad buffet for breakfast; pizza for lunch with bread and salad buffet; plus daily dinner. Kitchen breaks between meals. Modern decor.
